author: protolambda
content: I recommend not using Go pointers within proto-node

author: protolambda
content: It's already all in an array, and pruning is much easier if you can adjust indices after shifting/modifying/slicing the array

author: protolambda
content: Also, raw indices make persisting the array really easy, so you can store/load it  from disk for quick starts
